channel.title: The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'S' on Tech Terminologies
channel.description: Recent content in The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'S' on Tech Terminologies

item.title: What is a Self-Extracting Installer?
item.description: A self-extracting installer is a software application that allows users to install a program or application onto their computer without the need for additional decompression tools.

item.title: What is Star Topology?
item.description: Star topology is a type of network architecture in which each device on the network is connected to a central hub or switch.

item.title: What is Social Engineering?
item.description: Social engineering is a term used to describe the psychological manipulation of individuals into performing actions or divulging sensitive information.

item.title: What is a Serial Number?
item.description: A serial number is a unique identification number or code that is used to activate a software application.

item.title: What is a SCSI Host Adapter?
item.description: A SCSI (Small Computer System Interface) host adapter is a device that connects to a computer and allows it to communicate with SCSI devices, such as hard drives, tape drives, and scanners.
